Comment: Jesus, you’ve assumed a lot about me based on this post. I’m sharing it because I’m suspicious of the DEA’s story. And it may surprise you, but Michigan - or at least certain parts of it - has vibrant and large immigrant communities (probably not as large as LA due to the sheer population size of your state, but still).
Author: jayclaw97

Comment: Considering we have the largest Muslim population outside of the middle east in the metro and a large ICE facility in the Downtown.  I would say we have a good amount  That is not even to mention the large Hispanic, Bangladeshi, Albanian, Ukranian, Polish, Russian, and then many smaller immigrant population we have here.  Every major city across the country has large populations of immigrants, and that is what happens when you have a country made up of immigrants and even the "Americans" pretty much all came from somewhere else in the last 500 years.
